issue.title: [Doc][Java] Fix typos in slice page in Cookbook
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-17801](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17801). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The slice instructions say "splice" in a couple of places. 

Check for other typos

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17801?focusedCommentId=17607795) by Larry White (ljw1001):*
This should have been handled under the arrow-cookbook project
